title: Armor Safe Technologies Partners with OptConnect to Offer Managed Wireless Service to Growing Smart Safe Market
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 1:47 PM   OptConnect 
KAYSVILLE, Utah -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- OptConnect Managed Wireless Solutions is pleased to announce a new partnership with Armor Safe Technologies. Wireless technology will now be an available option across the Armor Safe Technologies platform of products. 
“Smart safes have revolutionized the way merchants manage cash, providing for greater accountability and transparency,” noted Larry Robinson, President and Managing Partner of Armor Safe Technologies. “The exciting thing about the smart safe industry is connectivity. Armor Safe had been looking for a way to leverage our technology with a cost effective wireless platform. With OptConnect, we have found the solution.” 
Smart safes depend on a reliable communications channel in order to monitor performance and communicate with financial institutions. The need to install a new line can add delays and expense to most smart safe installations. OptConnect Managed Wireless Solutions allows new devices to be deployed rapidly, without any need to connect to the location’s existing network connection. 
“We are proud to work with Armor Safe Technologies. The smart safe market is growing rapidly, and Armor Safe is well positioned to continue to lead in that space. With the addition of OptConnect Managed Wireless Service, we hope to help accelerate that growth,” noted Chris Bair, Executive Vice President of OptConnect. 
OptConnect Managed Wireless Solutions offers an end-to-end wireless communications solution. This includes wireless hardware, secure network connections, monitoring, support, and analytics. 
Smart safes utilizing OptConnect Managed Wireless Solutions are available now from Armor Safe Technologies. 
About Armor Safe Technologies 
Founded in 1976, Armor Safe Technologies ( http://armorsafe.com ) specializes in the development, deployment and servicing of the industry's most innovative cash-management systems. Our safes validate, count and secure cash in cassettes ready for delivery to your bank, establishing an effective closed-loop solution for many of your toughest challenges: loss prevention, employee accountability and financial transparency. 
About OptConnect 
OptConnect ( www.OptConnect.com ) is North America’s leading provider of managed service wireless connectivity for ATMs, Smart Safes, Kiosks, Micro Markets, Digital Signage and other custom applications. OptConnect specializes in end-to-end managed wireless service, providing customers with hardware, network connectivity, management software, 24/7 technical support, system alerts and more.
